text: Garry Newman (born May 20, 1982) is a British video game developer. In 2004, Newman founded Facepunch Studios while working on Garry's Mod, a Half-Life 2 mod. As of October 2010, he lives in Walsall, England. == References == Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:People in the video game industry
title: Garry Newman
